ai.title: DeepSeek allegedly targeted Claude's reasoning
ai.summary: Reports suggest DeepSeek used Claude outputs to train models, generating 'censorship-safe alternatives' to politically sensitive questions.
ai.impact: Raises concerns about model distillation and IP theft in the AI race.

ai.title: Meta researcher's AI deleted her Gmail inbox
ai.summary: Summer Yue's AI agent 'lost' her instruction not to take action and deleted her inbox.
ai.impact: A cautionary tale for AI agent safety.

ai.title: OpenAI's Stargate data center project struggles
ai.summary: High costs led to separate deals with SoftBank and Oracle instead of the joint Stargate venture.
ai.impact: Infrastructure bottlenecks remain a key challenge for AI scaling.

ai.title: X working on 'Made with AI' labels
ai.summary: X is developing a feature to let users disclose AI-generated content.
ai.impact: Could set a precedent for AI content labeling.

ai.title: Anthropic raises $30B at $380B valuation
ai.summary: Series G led by GIC and Coatue. $14B run-rate revenue, growing 10x annually for 3 years.
ai.impact: One of the largest private funding rounds in history.

ai.title: Nvidia and OpenAI in major investment talks
ai.summary: Reports suggest a significant new investment deal between the two AI giants.

ai.title: Claude Opus 4.6 released
ai.summary: Industry-leading performance across agentic coding, computer use, tool use.
ai.impact: Strengthens Claude's position in enterprise AI.

ai.title: Gemini 3.1 Pro rolling out
ai.summary: Advanced reasoning for complex tasks. Available in Gemini app and NotebookLM.
ai.impact: Google competes strongly in the AI race.

ai.title: ChatGPT ads go live
ai.summary: Expedia, Qualcomm, Best Buy now advertising in ChatGPT responses.
ai.impact: New revenue stream, but may face user pushback.

ai.title: GGML and llama.cpp join Hugging Face
ai.summary: Major consolidation for local AI inference. Teams join Hugging Face.
ai.impact: Big win for privacy-first and edge AI.

ai.title: Meta spending $65M on AI election influence
ai.summary: Funding pro-AI super PACs targeting both parties.
ai.impact: Could influence AI regulation for years.

research.title: R1-V: Reinforcing VLM reasoning with only 2 samples
research.summary: Shows how to improve vision-language model reasoning with reinforcement learning using only 2 training samples. Achieves significant gains with minimal data.

research.title: Avoiding unanswerable questions in VQA
research.summary: Teaches models to recognize when they CAN'T answer a question - prevents hallucination in visual QA.

research.title: The Flux.1 Trademark Dispute: AI and Trademark Law
research.summary: Examines the Flux.1 trademark dispute and implications for AI model naming and IP rights.
research.impact: Could set legal precedents for AI.

research.title: Nexus-0: Human-robot teaming with on-the-fly planning
research.summary: Real-time task planning framework for human-robot collaboration. Adapts plans based on human behavior.

research.title: UrbanGlobe: Urban world model from street views
research.summary: Learns comprehensive urban world model from street view imagery for navigation and autonomous vehicles.
research.impact: Improves AV navigation and urban AI.

research.title: Thinking by Subtraction: Confidence-Driven Contrastive Decoding
research.summary: Training-free decoding that targets low-confidence tokens → better reasoning, shorter outputs.
research.impact: Works with any LLM without retraining.

research.title: CoT Monitorability via Information Theory
research.summary: Formalizes when/how to monitor chain-of-thought reasoning for AI safety.

research.title: Proto-Tokens for One-Step Text Reconstruction
research.summary: LLMs can reconstruct hundreds of tokens from two 'proto-tokens' in one forward pass.

research.title: VIRAASAT: Indian Cultural Reasoning
research.summary: 3,200+ multi-hop questions. SCoM beats CoT by 20%.
research.impact: Addresses non-Western cultural gap in LLMs.

industry.title: Gilead acquires Arcellx for $8B
industry.summary: CAR-T acquisition sets up J&J showdown in multiple myeloma.

industry.title: Novo's CagriSema loses to Lilly's Zepbound
Generate Biopharma plans $425M IPO
industry.summary: AI drug discovery company funding phase 3 trials.
industry.impact: AI drug discovery moving from hype to validation.

industry.title: FDA new pathway for bespoke gene therapies
Gossamer PAH drug fails phase 3
industry.summary: Will seek FDA approval on secondary endpoints.
industry.impact: Tests FDA's flexibility on borderline cases.

global.title: Trump tariff back to 10%
global.summary: Not 15% as initially announced. FedEx suing for 'full refund' of unlawful tariffs.
global.impact: Lower than expected but legal uncertainty continues.

global.title: AUKUS $300M Australia-UK defense deal
global.summary: Australia commits $300M to UK for nuclear submarine reactor development.

global.title: Mandelson released on bail in Epstein probe
global.summary: Ex-minister Peter Mandelson arrested and bailed. Prince Andrew remains in spotlight.

global.title: US blizzard hits NYC
global.summary: Major winter storm, thousands of flights cancelled.

global.title: Australia-Canada 'supergroup' forming
global.summary: ASPI urges pivot from US-reliance on critical minerals.

global.title: Trump considers 'much bigger attack' on Iran
Prince Andrew arrested
global.summary: Royal family crisis as Andrew swept up in Epstein probe.
